meanings.definition: The act of going on a safari.
meanings.sent1: Safariing can be an exciting adventure for families.
meanings.sent2: We planned a safariing trip to see lions and elephants.
meanings.sent3: The children were thrilled to go safariing and spot zebras.
meanings.sent4: In the world of safariing, every turn can bring a new surprise.
meanings.sent5: The guide made the safariing experience unforgettable with his stories.

meanings.definition: The activity of observing or hunting wild animals in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent1: During safariing, we quietly watched the majestic lions.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoy safariing to see giraffes and rhinos up close.
meanings.sent3: The group went safariing and tried to 'hunt' the perfect photo.
meanings.sent4: In the art of safariing, patience is key to spotting elusive animals.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of safariing lies in the unexpected encounters with wildlife.

meanings.definition: The experience of traveling through a wildlife reserve or national park to view animals.
meanings.sent1: Our safariing journey through the park was filled with amazing sights.
meanings.sent2: People from all over the world come for safariing in this reserve.
meanings.sent3: Grandma found safariing hilarious when a monkey stole her hat.
meanings.sent4: Safariing through the park felt like exploring a hidden paradise.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset made our safariing adventure even more magical.
